title: Mewgenics: Neurodiverse Cats Resonate, Fans Applaud Inclusivity
summary: Edmund McMillen's Mewgenics recently added autism as an inherited trait for its cats. This decision sparked overwhelmingly positive fan reactions, with players feeling seen and represented by the game.

title: HP Laptop Subscriptions: Bad Deal or Future of Tech?
summary: HP's new laptop subscription service, highlighted by Linus Tech Tips, is stirring debate. Critics argue it's a bad deal for consumers, raising concerns about ownership in an increasingly subscription-based world.

title: Helion Fusion Heats Up: 150MÂ°C Milestone Toward Microsoft Power
summary: Helion's Polaris device recently reached 150 million degrees Celsius, a critical step for fusion energy. This milestone brings them closer to their 2028 goal of supplying electricity to Microsoft.

title: Self-Driving Glitch: Waymo Asks Humans to Shut Doors
summary: Waymo's autonomous vehicles get stuck if a door is left open, halting operations. To solve this unexpected flaw, Waymo is reportedly asking DoorDash drivers for assistance in manually closing vehicle doors.

title: Waterproof Kicks: The Hidden Costs of Dry Feet
summary: Waterproof sneakers promise dry, warm feet during wet runs, an appealing prospect. However, this innovative footwear might come with unexpected trade-offs you need to consider.

title: Apple Trio Charged: Best 2026 Wireless Travel Chargers
summary: Keep your Apple iPhone, Watch, and AirPods fully charged on the go with our top 2026 picks. These compact, folding 3-in-1 wireless travel chargers ensure your tech trio stays powered wherever you roam.
